title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 27-2.6 - Student Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 27-2.6 - Student Eligibility

State Regulations

To be eligible for benefits pursuant to the provisions of

Education Law section 6452, a student enrolled in the City University of New

York or State University of New York must be both educationally and
economically disadvantaged per the criteria established in section
27-1.1
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
27-2.6

Adopted

New

York State Register March 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 13, eff. 3/28/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
